"general_topic": "Émile Zola's open letter, 'J'accuse...!', publicly accuses the French military and government of a grave miscarriage of justice in the Dreyfus Affair. Zola systematically details a conspiracy involving high-ranking officials who fabricated evidence, obstructed justice, and covered up the truth to unjustly convict Alfred Dreyfus of treason while protecting the real culprit, Major Esterhazy, thereby undermining the Republic's principles of truth and justice.",
